name: Cyber Runner
description:
This is a fast-paced endless running and avoiding game. The levels are all randomly generated by the program and can be challenged forever.

Players need to control the characters to run forward and avoid obstacles on the left and right, and jump to avoid falling into the abyss.

Gameplay

  • Keep running forward and avoid obstacles.
  • Players can run left and right and jump.
  • Collect energy bar to accumulate higher scores.

Game Features

  • Support Steam leaderboard.
  • Support Steam achievements.
